reasoning: Pulmonary embolism incidence approximately 60 per 100k person-years globally based on epidemiological studies and hospital registry data. Varies by age and risk factors. Third-line data from hospital-based epidemiology studies circa 2005.
source: Kearon C et al. (2008). Antithrombotic therapy for VTE disease. Chest. 133(6_suppl):454S-545S
